data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Free kick for Crystal Palace in the half of Liverpool.
In the minute 1, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Liverpool in London.
Liverpool take a 0-1 lead thanks to Takumi Minamino.
In the minute 3, Sadio Mane with an assist there.
Jon Moss awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in Crystal Palace.
In the minute 9, Crystal Palace have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
Free kick for Liverpool in their own half.
Jon Moss signals a free kick to Crystal Palace in their own half.
In the minute 12, In London a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Corner awarded to Crystal Palace.
Liverpool awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 14, Liverpool awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Crystal Palace in the half of Liverpool.
Crystal Palace pushes forward through Luka Milivojevic, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 18, Wilfried Zaha of Crystal Palace is pulled up for offside.
Crystal Palace have a goal kick.
Jon Moss signals a free kick to Crystal Palace.
In the minute 25, Corner awarded to Liverpool.
Throw-in for Liverpool in their own half.
Ball safe as Liverpool is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Liverpool at Selhurst Park.
Free kick Crystal Palace.
Crystal Palace push forward at Selhurst Park and Jordan Ayew gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Liverpool defence.
In the minute 29, Liverpool have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
Joel Matip (Liverpool) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Goal kick for Crystal Palace at Selhurst Park.
In the minute 30, Crystal Palace to take a throw-in in Liverpool territory.
Can Crystal Palace get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Liverpool's half?
Crystal Palace have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
In the minute 32, Crystal Palace push upfield and Jeffrey Schlupp gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Liverpool defence.
Jon Moss signals a throw-in for Liverpool, close to Crystal Palace's area.
Throw-in Crystal Palace.
In the minute 34, Crystal Palace's Jordan Ayew has run offside.
Goal! Liverpool extend their lead to 0-2 through Sadio Mane.
Great play from Roberto Firmino to set up the goal.
In the minute 38, Jon Moss awards Crystal Palace a goal kick.
Can Crystal Palace capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Liverpool's half?
Crystal Palace have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 40, Corner awarded to Crystal Palace.
Crystal Palace are coming forward and Wilfried Zaha gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
In the minute 41, Throw-in for Liverpool at Selhurst Park.
Free kick for Crystal Palace in their own half.
Throw-in for Crystal Palace close to the penalty box.
In the minute 44, It's now 0-3 in London as Roberto Firmino scores for Liverpool.
That's a fine assist from Andrew Robertson.
At Selhurst Park, Crystal Palace are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 45, Jon Moss signals a free kick to Liverpool in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Crystal Palace will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Liverpool.
Trent Alexander-Arnold for Liverpool gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Crystal Palace goal kick.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
In the minute 45, Nathaniel Clyne (Crystal Palace) has received a first yellow card.
The second-half has started.
Liverpool awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 47, Jon Moss awards the away team a throw-in.
Jon Moss signals a Liverpool throw-in in Crystal Palace's half.
Crystal Palace awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 50, Jon Moss signals a free kick to Crystal Palace in their own half.
Throw-in for Crystal Palace in their own half.
Crystal Palace needs to be cautious. Liverpool have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 52, Jordan Henderson puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-4.
Trent Alexander-Arnold instrumental with a fine assist.
Important block from the Crystal Palace defence as Sadio Mane fires in a strike for Liverpool.
In the minute 56, Liverpool have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
Jon Moss signals a free kick to Liverpool.
Mohamed Salah is on a sub for Sadio Mane for Liverpool.
In the minute 59, Ball safe as Crystal Palace is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Liverpool's Takumi Minamino gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Crystal Palace have a goal kick.
In the minute 60, Throw-in for Liverpool in their own half.
Throw-in Liverpool.
Throw-in for Crystal Palace at Selhurst Park.
In the minute 63, The home team replace Cheikhou Kouyate with James Tomkins.
In London Crystal Palace attack through Patrick Van Aanholt. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Liverpool goal kick.
In the minute 65, Jon Moss signals a throw-in for Liverpool, close to Crystal Palace's area.
Crystal Palace awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Crystal Palace.
In the minute 68, Goal! Roberto Firmino extends Liverpool's lead to 0-5.
Great play from Mohamed Salah to set up the goal.
The home team have replaced Eberechi Eze with Michy Batshuayi. This is the second substitution made today by Roy Hodgson.
In the minute 70, Jurgen Klopp is making the team's second substitution at Selhurst Park with Curtis Jones replacing Georginio Wijnaldum.
Free kick Liverpool.
Liverpool have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 73, Ball safe as Liverpool is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Crystal Palace push upfield but Jon Moss quickly pulls them for offside.
Jairo Riedewald is replacing James McArthur for the home team.
In the minute 75, Liverpool make their third substitution with Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain replacing Roberto Firmino.
In London a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Gary Cahill for Crystal Palace is whistled offside.
In the minute 81, Corner awarded to Liverpool.
Goal! Mohamed Salah extends Liverpool's lead to 0-6 in London with a header.
Joel Matip instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 82, Goal kick for Liverpool at Selhurst Park.
Great finish from Mohamed Salah to give Liverpool a 0-7 lead.
That's a fine assist from Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain.
In the minute 86, In London Crystal Palace's Michy Batshuayi is caught offside.
Play has been interrupted briefly in London to check on Gary Cahill, who is grimacing with pain.
Crystal Palaceâ€™s Gary Cahill is on his feet again at Selhurst Park.
Crystal Palace drive forward but Michy Batshuayi is judged offside.
1 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in London.
The match has come to a close in London. The final score is 0-7.
